links.rulesMobile: Terms and conditions of the service

statusDescriptions.guest: Ideal for acquaintance with service possibilities

aml.updateAccountStatusText1: You can change your account status to {{statusName}} status. The status of your account will be confirmed after successfull verification of documents.
aml.updateAccountStatusText2: Verification from 2 stages, it does not take much time. If you don't understand something, write to us. We will help :)
aml.verificationSuccessNotice: You have successfully confirmed your account status! Then you can proceed to exchange operations and take full advantage of your account!
aml.closeVerificationNotice: Are you sure you want to interrupt your account verification process? {{br}} You can continue the verification procedure from your personal account.
aml.notice: For full access to the service functionality, you need to verify your account. Pay attention to {{requirements}}. You can apply to change your documents:
aml.startVerificationText1: You have successfully regisftered in {{status}} status. The status of your account will be confirmed after successfull verification of documents.
aml.startVerificationText2: Verification from {{stepCount}}. It does not take much time. If you do not understand something, write to us. We will help :)
aml.passedAnotherStatus: You have moved to the status of "{{status}}"
aml.pendingVerificationTitle: Тайтл модалки о том что ваша заявка на рассмотрении

aml.rejectedVerificationText: текст о том что заявка отклонена и нужно продолжить верификацию

documents.changeDocumentsNotice: You will need to go through the procedure of checking documents again by AML specialists, after changing your documents. Are you sure you want to change the details of your documents?
documents.orderSendedNotice: Your application for verification of account status has been sent. Application processing time is 48 hours. Your account will become even more secure after confirming your documents!

setting.rejectedNotify: In the section {{section}}, you can see the reason of the rejection.
setting.pendingNotifyTitle: Your application for status has been successfully sent!
setting.pendingNotify: The application will be processed within 48 hours.
setting.verificationNotifyTitle: You need to send a request for verification!
setting.verificationNotify: You have filled in all the data necessary to verify the status of your account. Send your application for verification of account status in the section {{section}}.
setting.clientDataNotifyTitle: You need to fill in your personal data!
setting.clientDataNotify: To remove restrictions on exchange operations and secure your founds, please fill in your personal data in your account settings. {{fillLink}}.
setting.uploadDocumentsNotify: You have already filled out the basic data of the profile, it remains to upload documents and you can exchange on the amount and get access to all payment methods without restrictions.
setting.confirmMailNotify: To confirm your account status, please confirm your e-mail by clicking on the link in the letter, which was sent to your email.
setting.confirmPhoneNotifyTitle: Link your phone number to your account!
setting.confirmPhoneNotify: To receive notifications from the service and for further verification of the status of your account, link your phone number to your account in the settings. {{fillLink}}.
setting.needVerificationNotifyTitle: You need to boost your account status
setting.needVerificationNotify: Kassa.cc will start work under a European license from January 1, 2019. Go through simple account verification to get new features.
setting.notAuthorizedNotify: Kassa.cc will start work under a European license from January 1, 2019. Go through simple account verification to get new features.

refPage.referalFundsNotice: Share a partner link, invite friends and earn to 1% for exchange your referrals.
refPage.shareSocials: You can share link quickly in social networks:

shareText.common: Hi! Find cool service which will allow quickly and safely exchange your money. Come to the site, sign up and you will get discount 5% from me right now for every type of exchange. Also from every exchange with my link you will receive bonuses, from 5 invited friends you will receive presents (Including iPad mini)
shareText.twitter: Hi! Find cool service which will allow quickly and safely exchange your money.

refPage.needVerificationStatus: To get your bonus for status verification, you must complete verification.
refPage.needFinishVerificationStatus: To get your bonus for status verification you need to download the documents.
refPage.noneVerificationStatus: To get your bonus for status verification, you must pass verification
refPage.verificationProcessingStatus: You will receive your bonus for status verification after processing your verification application (from 2 to 48 hours).
refPage.successVerificationStatus: Your bonus will be credited to your account on December 1, 2018 in gratitude.
refPage.rejectedVerificationStatus: To get your bonus for status verification, you must pass verification
refPage.rewardsNotice: Receive pleasant bonus for every exchange, move money on any available account for you.
refPage.title: Referral program
refPage.about: Referal program - it is a type of earning for sign in users of our service as a exchange remunerations who came to us due your referral link.
refPage.why: Share partnership link, use promo materials, invite friends and earn up to 1% for exchange your referrals.

partnersPage.firstDescription:
Do you want to earm with us? Register
in our site and you'll be able to take a part in our referal program and
contributory system of discounts! After register you automatically get
contributory discount for exchange — 5%.
partnersPage.secondDescription:
We are pleased to invite monitorings of exchanges.
We are very glad to new partners and ready to share profit.
partnersPage.secondDescription2:
Register in our site and you wil get special
referal link.
partnersPage.thirdDescription:
You have your own online store, landing,
     or you sell some product or service, but you do not have the opportunity
     to accept payments? With our help you will accept payments from different banks.
     and payment systems at favorable rates for your customers! With each
     payment made through our service, you will receive rewards.
     Learn more at {{email}}.

contactsPage.firstDescription: If you have got any technical or financial questions, write us and we will help you. We answer on questions queries within 15-60 minutes depending on load service.
contactsPage.secondDescription: If you have got proposal for cooperations, connectionmonitoring, questions about  commercial adding nwe wallet - write us, we always welcome to cooperation!

rest.title: Technical break
rest.subtitle: We were taken and have promised to return in {{time}}
rest.notice: Don't worry, if your application came in technical break. {{br}} It will process in the short term :)

AddReferal.NoAskPS: Select payment system with which you want to transfer money

notify.errorLoading: No connection with server. Information may be obsolete. Please {{refreshPage}}
notify.rest: Dear clients, our service is on technical break. Come back in {{icon}} {{time}}

MonitoringModal.title: For monitorings
MonitoringModal.invite: We are pleased to invite monitorings of exchanges.We are very glad to new partners and ready to share profit.
MonitoringModal.referalLink: Register in our site and you wil get special referal link.
MonitoringModal.reward: All monitorings has a standart 0,5% from the exchange amount of your referrals. Write us on mail kassa.today@gmail.com and in special sutiations we will talk abou size of your per cent.

SiteConnectionModal.title: Payments reception for your site

If you have got its internet-shop, landing or you sell
any goods or services, but it is not possible to accept payment?

With us you can accept payments from different banks
and payment system at favourable rates for your cleints! With every
payment the channeling through our service you will recieve remunerations.
SiteConnectionModal.contact: If you want to read more, write us on mail {{email}}.

Turning to you account you agree with conditions and

requestStatus.waitingDescr: Soon application will process. {{br}} Have any questions {{chat}}.
requestStatus.waitingDescrMinute: Your application will process in {{minute}} minutes.
requestStatus.fail: The application has not been accepted
requestStatus.freezeReasonHour: It is your first application from this wallet on Yandex.Money. It will process in {{hour}} hours, when it exits from freezing.
requestStatus.freezeReasonHourLegacy: It is your first application from this Yandex.Money wallet. She will unfreeze and process in {{hour}}
requestStatus.freezeNotice: Application is frozen. For clarifying the sources contact with operator.
requestStatus.freezeReason: It is your first application from this wallet on Yandex.Money. It will process in the short term, when it exits from freezing.
requestStatus.freezeHelp: Why first payment need to freeze?
requestStatus.adoptedReff: Your apoplication on withdrawal earning fund is accepted!

paymentDataManager.text1:
For your convenience we turned on service function "Saving
 entered data", this simplify creating of application by way of boxes preserve
detail for every direction, which you using.
All entered data will save on your computer in browser, throught
you make exchange.
paymentDataManager.label: Turn on preservation of data

help.password: The password must contain 8 symbols and include numbers, lowercase and uppercase letters of English alphabet.

promoPage.notice: In this section special for partners and users of our service we have prepared several optiions of banners. They stylized under our brand and convenient for promotional and dissemination in the internet.

rewardsRequest.title: Application for remunerations
rewardsRequest.safeOutput: Well done! Great job, but now we {{br}} ready withdraw funds on any aviable {{br}} below and comfortable wallet.
rewardsRequest.needСonfirmation: We care about safety of your account. To conclude {{br}} application for withdrawal your remunerations we sent on your mail {{br}} lellet with link for confirming creation of application. {{br}} On all matters or in case of delay with transfer of funds take it up with technical support. {{br}} Respectfully, site administration.

ReferalList.title: Referral list
ReferalList.content: Discription of referral program: this is leading international exchange service of electronic currencies. We make the exchange, entering and withdrawal: Perfect Money, BTC, BTC cods, Payeer, Qiwi, Yandex. Money and also carry out bank transfer orders. We working with banks like Sberbank, Alfa Bank, VTB24 and Tinkoff.

remindSended.text1: Yay! You succesfully change your password. {{br}} Now you can move to your account.

remindRequestSended.mailSendedDescribe: On your mail {{br}} we had sent letter with futher instructions.

in your letter.

ReserveRequest.title: Application for restock reserve
ReserveRequest.description: Special for you we restock reserve on necessary amount in the short term. Our manager will connect with {{br}} in the short term.

subtitles.user: You need to enter your name, date of birth, select the type of account and agree with the rules of service.
subtitles.email: You need to enter your email address and confirm it by the link in the letter.

password.min: Password should not include lower then ${min} symbols
password.requiredType: Password must contain no less then 8 symbols. Also contain lowercase and uppercase letters of the English alphabet and numbers too.

name.min: Name should not include lower then ${min} symbols
name.max: Password should not include more then ${max} symbols

signupIncorrectCode.text: The code is activated or wrong.

signupSuccess.content: New account was successfully registered. {{br}} Now you can use your account.

error.numLen: You have entered invalid card number. The card number must contain 12-20 digits.

verificationPage.notice: For verification you should be take a picture of the card from faceside with our site on background. Verification process takes few minutes and require only once on every new card.
verificationPage.requirement1: On photo must be read card numbe, owner's name.
verificationPage.requirement2: On backside should be see monitor with opened kassa.cc site
verificationPage.title: Card verification

verificationForm.title: Add card
verificationForm.labelName: Enter full name of card owner:

exchange.notAvailableDirectionButton: write to operator in the chat
exchange.notAvailableDirection: You have switched {{incomePaymentSystem}} to {{outcomePaymentSystem}}. This direction is currently unavailable. Please {{buttonChat}}.

error.agree: You should accept with exchange rules
error.min: Too small sum for exchange. Exchange sum should be more then {{limit}} {{currency}}
error.depletedReserve: Now we haven't got reserve for exchange. {{br}} {{button}}
error.reserveNoPayment: You chose wrong payment system. Choose payment system again.

exchange.neoNotice: When exchanging from any direction to NEO, you can specify the amount of exchange convertible to the whole NEO. You can indicate the amount of exchange in the next column, or select the amount that suits you below:

instructionRequisites.description: Make a transfer to the following details:

instructionData.deadline: Time to pay for application has expired! Please, {{replay}} {{br}} topical rate or {{br}} {{sopport}} service.

toRequestReserve.text: You can keep your application on {{button}}

instructionEvoucher.designation: Ener number {{name}} and activation code. {{br}} If you need add one code click {{br}} «Add check»

instructionCoin.designation: After payment {{required}} click {{br}} button "I have paid" for creating application:

failurePayment.title: Payment not been received
failurePayment.content: Within 18 minutes the payment for your application has not been credited to our account. In the event that funds have been written off from your account, contact technical support.

paymentConfirm.title: Switch to form of payment
paymentConfirm.description: Click "Move now" for switching to payment page

finish.title: Application №{{id}} has succesfully create and accepted in processing!
finish.notice: In 20 minutes after obtaining your money on our account it will process and funds will enroll on wallet specified by you.
finish.track: Track status you can find in your account.
finish.noReserve: Warning! At the moment have not enought reserve and processing time of application can be increased from 1 to 6 hours.
finish.newUser: Login and passoword have sent on your e-mail.
finish.besure: Please make sure that you not only click on button "I have paid", but really sent funds to us.
finish.support: On all matters or in case of exchange delay, write us to technical support.
finish.hold: We hold your transfer for 48 hours. It's a payment system rules. An operator will process your order in 20 minutes afterward.

paymentWaiting.title: Waiting for application payment №{{id}}
paymentWaiting.string1:
Waiting flow of funds for application.
As soon as application will pay {{br}} we automatically move you to your account.

contactPage.mmgp: Check out with feedbacks and write its on {{mmgpLink}}
contactPage.reviews: Your support is very important for us and every your feedback will help us getting better! Thank you for choosing us!

forbiddenPage.title: Access to your account is denied
forbiddenPage.text: Please authorise in form entrance. If you forget password move to recovery password page.

notFoundPage.text: Probably this page is deleted or you entered incorrect page adress. Move to home page and use navigational menu.

verificationFail.remove: Your verificated card is succesfully deleted!
verificationFail.removeFail: Could not delete the electronic card

error.required: Necessarily enter one or several checks/bills

authOverlay.text: Please login or register to continue exchange.

confirm.title: Attention! Card verification.
confirm.content: You must verify your card to complete the exchange. {{br}} Verification of the card will take from 1 to 5 minutes.

upload.title: Verification of cards
upload.description: Please take a photo of your bank card with any device on the background of the monitor (screen) of the computer with the open tab of the Kassa.cc website.{{br}}This is necessary for confirming the voluntary transfer of your funds from the card to make an exchange on our website.
upload.requirement1: On the photo card number and the name of the owner should be readable.
upload.requirement2: The monitor should be visible behind the card (in the background) with the open tab of the site kassa.cc

wait.title: Waiting for card verification application processing
wait.content: We are awaiting the processing of an application for card verification. We will automatically notify you as soon as the application will be processed.

failure.title: Verification Failure
failure.reasonLabel: You were canceled verification of the card because of:
failure.repeatNotice: Try to verify the card again!

accountPage.title: My cards and accounts
accountPage.notice: List of accounts available for exchange
accountPage.accountEmptyNotice: Link your first bank card. You need to link your valid card to your account to prove that you own it. Your card will be charged the minimum amount to confirm. The amount will be returned to your card, after checking the holding.
accountPage.addAccountNotice: You need to link your valid card to your account to prove that you own it. Your card will be charged the minimum amount to confirm. The amount will be returned to your card, after checking the holding.

cardImage.label: Upload a photo of the front side of a bank card

accountPage.pendingCardVerificationNotice: We are checking your card details. Usually the test takes 2-3 minutes, but it can take up to 24 hours.
accountPage.successCardVerificationNotice: Your bank card has been successfully verified. Now you can start to exchange transactions.
accountPage.rejectedCardVerificationNotice: Your application for verification of a bank card has been rejected.

instructionLink.description: Go to your Sberbank account and log in. You can read the instructions on how to transfer funds from Sberbank to Yandex.Money accounts in the FAQ section.
